"Hunar": "What is this... This overwhelming strength, Guardian...!"
"No. This is also... that failure."
"Incredible...! I... lost...!"
"<%me>! Are you ok!?"
"This power..."
"Besides that, the other two..."
"I don't know either... The energy signal was exactly that of Dark Falz [Elder]..."
"That's right, Melphonsina is..."
"Gettemhart is no longer here. And Melphonsina is..."

"Oi, <%me>.
Show me your thanks for letting you use my strength."

"Yo Sina.
That was a pretty bad performance we had."
"Well, Gettemhart... Taking a hit and instead being used like a doll, that was clumsy of me."
"But it's finished... <%me> finished it for us."
"Yeah, I saw. It was as expected from the Guardian. Thank you very much..."
"It took forever, getting here."
"Yeah, it took forever."
"I'm so tired now... Everyone won't get mad if I sleep now, right?"
"Hah, I won't let those who took a break earlier complain about it."
"So then, guess I'll sleep then..."
"Right."
"Goodbye, Gettemhart..."
"See you, Sina."
"This is our final stop. For both Sina, who is a memory, and I, who no longer exist. This is the end of our records."

"However, <%me>.
This isn't your end. There's things
you still have yet to do."
"Ephimera and the Devil Castles... They're the root of destruction in this world."
"There's so many of those Devil Castles left in Verun."

"We have to do something about them...
Otherwise, how could we face those two."
"I've been consumed by [Elder] and now I'm being consumed by the Guardian. Hah, what a weird twist of fate this is..."
"I knew that we had the same aura when we first met at Naberius... However, I'd never imagine that I'd be absorbed by you."
"I won't be bothering to ask what's going on. It's all a whim of the Akashic Record after all. Just thinking about it is useless."
"Now go, use my power... This power, the power of [Elder]."
"And save them... Show me how you handle things."
"<%me>, you've gained Gettemhart's Photons..."
"No, this is... [Elder]'s energy signal!"
"<%me>... What is this?"
"It's like you're a... Darker!"
"Kehaha, ahahaha. So you've obtained a power similar to my own! You are indeed a worthy opponent!"
"Guardian, it seems that it will be a one vs one fight between us!"
"I'm not alone."
"There's three here."
"Our thoughts... We entrust them to you."
"Use everything you've got and hit him hard!"
